attributes.action: Reinstate Rural Community Policing in Chatteris
attributes.additional_details:
The most significant rapidly increasing crime in Chatteris is that of burglary. Chattieris seems to have become a target for criminals now there is no longer any police presence in the town

Reported Crime Statistics ( Source - Cambs Police Statistics www.police.uk/.../Fenland_March_and_Chatteris/crime)
Burglaries
Feb 2016 - 18  
Feb 2015 - 10
Feb 2014  - 3

(The month of February was selected as this was the last time the online records were updated)
attributes.background:
Crimes in Chatteris are increasing at an alarming rate
 
Chatteris used to have a permanently based police team of 5 Constables and 1 Sergeant. Chatteris now has no police allocated/based to the town at all

We need the government to intercede with Cambs Police to restore policing to Chatteris

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The elected Police and Crime Commissioner for Cambridgeshire is responsible for policing in Chatteris. 

You can find out how to contact your local Police and Crime Commissioner: http://www.cambridgeshire-pcc.gov.uk/contact-us/
